title: Show your love with Valentine’s Day skins

replies.body: Thanks for the report, looking into it now.
The price includes champions even if I owned the champions already.
Found the same issue myself and chased it up as well. The bundle should now be available for purchase and properly discount for previously owned champions.
Why isn't the heart seeker ward available in store to purchase by itself ??
Worst poem I've ever read Riot :P stick to the puns
I have both of Verus and Annie, but the sweetheart set is 2348RP. That's why?
when does the lunar revel go to the vault again?
only playing varus again for the skin... so worth it
That Varus makes me fly like a bird.Worth the money rito
Thanks Riot, now there can be a #no-homo bot lane Armour of the Fifth Taric and Heartseeker Varus! {{champion:44}} {{champion:110}}
Health pots are red, frostfangs are blue, I can't find my tibbers but I'm glad I found you - My reaction to the new {{champion:1}}  skin
So the bundle wasn't available, now it is after relogging but I already own the champs and it wants full price? I'm just going to wait for fix :) xoxox {{summoner:13}}
I found a working clash of clans free gems at http://suprcl.com/coc-freegems and its great! You receive your Clash of Clans gems instantly!!! Visit and enjoy! (qUeXY5a8QG)
